name: Mr E's Conspiracy
description:
This was a 2 person final year project for my Game Design course, please excuse the messiness of it! I programmed the game and assembled it, my teammate Madeleine decorated the scenes, did all the writing and modeled objects :)

File is in a 7zip

!!PLEASE PLAY THE GAME IN 1024x768!!!!  (otherwise the text won't fit the dialogue box!!! I am SORRY this was my first time trying to program dialogue!!! T_T

IF YOU GET STUCK IN THE BEDROOM // FAQ

  • In the very first level the bed will disappear (don't worry it's not important- it's a bug that appeared in the final week of development and just didn't get fixed)
  • To proceed to the next level you must collect the phone, wallet, and keys, then click on the door to leave! (If you want to know where these objects are the phone is on the night stand, the keys are on the floor below the window, and the wallet is on the desk)
  • When you come back to the bedroom at night the bed won't appear but it can still be clicked on, this is how you finish the game (after using the conspiracy board)
  • bless this mess of a game

If you encounter any other issues or get stuck anywhere feel free to comment and I'll try my best to get back to you and help.

Thank you and I hope you enjoy this weird little game!
